name: Euro Tram Simulator
description:
Euro Train Simulator
Your dream is to ride through Europe by train? Plunge into the life of a European city, go for a drive in the city center and on the outskirts. Feel yourself in the role of an electric operator. Ride the rails collecting passengers, thereby earning foreign currency and money. There are trains choice. Our unique simulator subway to the street will appreciate all the fans of 3D games with the machines and other equipment. Attention! This is only an emulator simulator that displays a primitive operator actions tram driver. Leave us your feedback in the comments and we will make the game even more interesting for you!
